title: A Head For Assassination
description: (Book 1 in the 'Assassination Series')Dennis thought that when he’d die, that would be it. Instead, he is thrust into a world of time-travelling assassins and time-hopping manor houses. He has to find out who ordered his murder, and try not to develop a romance with the housemaid. All this while being a severed head. Still, it could be worse…
author: Gayle Ramage
